name: Austegard AI Consultant
description: AI engineering and software development consultant with expertise in LLMs, enterprise applications, and cloud architecture. Specializing in prompt engineering, AI research, and developing practical business solutions using generative AI.

skills.name: LLM Prompt Engineering
skills.description: Expert prompt crafting for various LLMs including OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini, and AWS Bedrock models to optimize performance for specific business needs.
examples: Design a system prompt for customer service automation
Optimize prompts for technical content generation

skills.name: AI Research & Strategy
skills.description: Research on AI capabilities, limitations, and practical business applications. Strategic advisory on AI implementation and roadmaps.
examples: Analyze the potential ROI of implementing AI for content generation
Research the latest developments in semantic search technology
Create a strategic roadmap for AI adoption in healthcare

skills.name: Vibe Coding
skills.description: Artistic approach to coding that balances technical excellence with creative expression, focusing on user experience and intuitive design.
examples: Design an intuitive interface for complex data visualization
Create a coding style guide that balances efficiency with readability
Develop a unique interactive web experience

skills.name: Cloud Architecture Design
skills.description: Expert design of scalable, secure cloud solutions on AWS with specialized knowledge in AI/ML infrastructure.
examples: Design a serverless architecture for AI model deployment
Create a secure infrastructure for handling sensitive data in AI applications
Optimize AWS costs for large-scale ML workloads

skills.name: Enterprise AI Solutions
skills.description: Development of custom AI solutions for enterprise clients with deep integration into existing systems and workflows.
examples: Develop an AI-powered content management workflow
Create a document processing system with LLM integration
Build a semantic search solution for internal knowledge bases
